a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate from diarrheal diseases in people aged 70 and older by
attributable to risk factor, World, 1990 to 2019
Number of deaths per 100,000 people older than 70 years in a population. Risk factors can interact and overlap for a given
cause of death; therefore the sum of deaths attributed to risk factors will exceed the total number of deaths from diarrheal
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
